subtitle: Fragrant turkey wontons. Great as a dinner party appetiser, or for a buffet.

method.text: Put the prepared water chestnuts, red pepper and salad onions in a bowl. Mix well.
In a large bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients. Stir in the vegetables.

Using a teaspoon, put a small amount of filling in the centre of each wonton wrapper. Dampen the edges with a little water. Bring up the two sides like a mini Cornish pastie. Press together the edges and trim with kitchen scissors. Ensure the filling is sealed in well.
Heat the oil in a deep fat fryer to 170?C. Deep fry in small batches. Drain on kitchen paper. Serve immediately.

title: Crispy wontons
